revised_title: Elastic Displacements in Polyethylene Crystals: Cross-Link Modeling and Analysis
tldr: The authors developed an elastic model of a cross-link between adjacent molecules in a polyethylene crystal to calculate the resulting molecular displacements. They used the elastic Green displacement tensor and a simplified discrete atomic model to obtain the displacements near the cross-link, providing a better understanding of the effects of cross-linking on the physical properties of polyethylene crystals.
